problem.markdown:
>>The soil forming factor that is most likely to influence erosion is: << () organisms (x) topography () parent material () time
[explanation] Topography is the soil forming factor that is most likely to influence erosion. For example, a steep slope would be more likely to become eroded than a shallow slope. Parent material, organisms, and time can have some influence on erosion, but generally not as much as topography. [explanation]
